product_name: Gracie by Soybu Katy Cardigan Sweater - Girls'
long_description: Girls can layer stylishly with the flowy Gracie by Soybu Katy Cardigan Sweater. It goes with everything in their closet when they just need a little extra coverage. Stretchy blend of modal fabric and spandex doesn't wrinkle and moves with her.
short_description: Girls can layer stylishly with the flowy Gracie by Soybu Katy Cardigan Sweater. It goes with everything in their closet when they just need a little extra coverage.
